Description: Upper part of a corroded copper alloy sceptre in the shape of a gazelle (oryx?) head.
Curator's comments: On small bronze figures, see W.M.F. Petrie, Tanis ii, Nebesheh and Defenneh, p. 80 § 80
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 80 § 80) (?)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.56, p.177, pl.19)
